name: Fly.io
description: Integrate with Fly.io to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Apps
tools.description: List all Fly.io apps in the organization. Returns app names, statuses, and networks.

tools.name: Get App
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Fly.io app by name.

tools.name: List Machines
tools.description: List all machines (VMs) for a Fly.io app. Returns machine IDs, states, regions, and image info.

tools.name: Start Machine
tools.description: Start a stopped Fly.io machine. The machine must be in a stopped state.

tools.name: Stop Machine
tools.description: Stop a running Fly.io machine. Optionally send a specific signal.

orgSlug.label: Organization Slug
orgSlug.description: Default Fly.io organization slug (optional, filters app listing)
